website_summaries.verdict: A well-made cap from a leading brand in swimwear with a durable, latex-free design.
pros: Available in over 20 colors and patterns
Popular choice for those with latex allergies, as it’s made of silicone
Elastomeric fit is comfortable and won’t pull or pinch hair and skin
Textured interior holds on for a shift-free fit
cons: Colors from product pictures can appear much different in person, though consumers rarely feel it’s a dealbreaker

customer_reviews.title: Seems decent
customer_reviews.text: I’m nervous after reading all the reviews about it ripping. We have a black version we bought from Dicks Sporting Goods and it has held up well. Hoping this is the same. Color was disappointing as we ordered Gravity and when we recieved it the cap was actually dark purple. Top is amazon pic/ bottom is actual product
customer_reviews.author: Bryelle

customer_reviews.title: Immediately ripped.
customer_reviews.text: This product immediately ripped, and all I did was stretch it over my head. Also, when I went to submit for a return, it said that the product is ineligible for return. I have emailed Amazon, because I thought if I order something on Prime I would be allowed to return it. Perhaps I'm wrong. In any case, it didn't trip for me stretching it too far, or having sharp nails, or a large head.
customer_reviews.author: Ronin Z

customer_reviews.title: crappy waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have had these before that worked great, this one not so much. It wouldnt seal properly, allowing water to get inside. I felt it as soon as I went underwater, got out immediately, pulled it off and had soaking wet hair. Not to mention it was ridiculously uncomfortable. I decided to give it a second try another day and was constantly having to pull it down bc it rode up the back of my head creating a bubble" at the top. Not good for keeping head dry, not good for streamlining, not comfortable, all in all turned out to be a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: LOOK ELSEWHERE - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. First time out of the package and in the pool, I wasn't even 100m into my swim before the cap had flooded on the inside and slipped off mid-flip turn. I've been using this model for years with no issues, I've never encountered such a useless cap before. And to top it off, this item is somehow "Not eligible for returns", so I'm SOL. Beyond disappointing. Would rate 0 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: The Mayor

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: i am a recreational swimmer and needed a swim cap to protect my balding head while swimming. my hat size is 7 1/4 and this cap fit nicely without feeling too tight. the pattern inside the cap keeps hair from pulling, yet the cap did not lose grip and ride up on me during swimming. ymmv depending upon the size of your head and hair length, or if you are a marathon swimmer (i am not).
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Not as descrbed
customer_reviews.text: I have shoulder length hair and the cap was too small. I pulled my hair into a bun and put the cap on as directed and the cap would not stay on. This product is non-refundable.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Won't Last
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife August 11th. She swims 3-4 times a week for maybe 15-20 min. I would have thought a Speedo cap would have lasted much longer since her other one is like 2 years old. Anyway this cap tore this morning when she attempted to put it on - 2 days after the return for Amazon expired. Live and learn I guess.
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: don't buy its probably a fake
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 4 months then completely ripped apart making it useless. better to buy the real thing in this case. I would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: color not as depicted!!
customer_reviews.text: like others complained, we ordered the color gravity and recieved a dark purple cap. luckily she likes the color but otherwise i would be returning. some people have complained of tearing and that is a pretty normal thing that happens with these silicone caps...when they are done, they are done done. it’s still our first choice for a cap regardless.
customer_reviews.author: ksnodgrass73

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not fully waterproof, some leakage beyond a small bit at the hairline
customer_reviews.text: The gravity color is definitely solid purple, which was great because that's what I wanted. I wasn't expecting it to be perfectly waterproof but even with my realistic expectations there was much more water leakage than I expected. This cap is good for protected the majority of your hair from water when you do NOT submerge your head. Fine for splashing around in the pool or on floats.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable over-the-ear cap
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Many, many miles swum and this cap is right up there on top. I like that it fits over the ears and usually never rides up -- I believe once or twice it did after about a mile, but I have already swum at least 90-100 1.5 mile days so far. I have other caps that lasted me over 3 years, so this one has a challenge still ahead of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy or Rich

customer_reviews.title: No smell, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: This cap goes on and off easily. It helps to wear goggles over the cap to keep the cap on in the water. Colors like red, pink, and peach fit a little tighter. Colors like blue, starry night, and black fit a little looser. The cap doesn't smell bad like latex caps so it is worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Desert rat

customer_reviews.title: Fake product. Not a real swimmers cap!
customer_reviews.text: Fake brand. Ugliest peptide pink ever. The image does not serve it well. If you want a bright fuscia, keep looking bc this pink is pepto bismal looking pink. Also the quality is fake. It’s super slippery and won’t stay on head. Not like a real swim cap.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Longlasting
customer_reviews.text: This brand of swim cap is excellent. I have been using the same type for years and have only had to replace it twice - over say 12 years of regular swimming in a chlorinated pool. This silicone type fits snugly so water stays out of my ears (I can't wear ear plugs) and is very durable. I would never try another brand!
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Don't be seduced! Too fragile!!
customer_reviews.text: I was seduced by the "more comfort" "no hair snagging" "Elastomeric" jingo, thinking it would be more comfortable than your average silicone swim cap. As other reviewers mentioned, it does not stay on too well - so the FIRST TIME I used this, I started noticing it sliding up the back of my head and I went to adjust the back of my head and RIP!! Did not last me 40 minutes in the water!!! So disappointed. Don't be seduced like I was, and stick to the regular swim cap.
customer_reviews.author: Ardith N.

customer_reviews.title: Really good. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son is a competitive swimmer who practices every day. He didn't like to wear cap at practice before. But since I happened to buy one of this and he tried he started to like it. Now he can't swim without a cap.
customer_reviews.author: J. Li

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect...at first
customer_reviews.text: Two months later, though, it will not stay on my head. Would not buy this again. I had high hopes for this after the first few weeks. I have tried caps in the past, but they would not stay put. Must be my pointy head...
customer_reviews.author: Boyds of Bahama

customer_reviews.title: VISIBLE
customer_reviews.text: got this bright neon cap to help make me visible when open water swimming- I've been spotted by all boats and haven't had any close calls. it also fits exceptionally well and stretches nicely for silicone!
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase discounted swim caps from a shop and paid $3-6.00.... they LASTED and held up over months... at least 6 months. I have barely used this item... a handful of times ....and a large piece broke off as I was putting it on.... and it was $15.00. DEFINITELY not the quality or durability it should be for the price. Yes... it's cool looking...but the quality is L-A-M-E.....
customer_reviews.author: bga

customer_reviews.title: Soaking wet hair, constantly adjusting
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this will stretch out after a few wears but for now it feels too tight & I constantly have to adjust it because it feels like it is creeping up my head in the front, back & by the ears! I am a 38 year old female with shoulder length hair & a normal size head. My hair was also soaking wet afterwards - I swim 3-4 times a week and need something that will keep my hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: loomis13

customer_reviews.title: I love this cap
customer_reviews.text: I love this cap! There's enough to room for my hair and it stays put through lap swimming, flip-turns, etc. The best part: it's so easy and comfortable to put on & take off - not at all reminiscent of my childhood days struggling painfully into latex caps!
customer_reviews.author: R. Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a high visibility cap for open water swimming. The color is a good match, but the cap is uncomfortable around the bottom. I grew up wearing a cap in competition and this is a different fit than what I’m used to. I’ve already started looking for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Speedo swim caps are durable
customer_reviews.text: Speedo really makes a high quality swim cap. I had my last one for several years. I recently ordered one from another company and it didn’t last a month. I got my new Speedo cap today which was super quick and am amazed at the thickness of the swim cap. So glad i got Speedo.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R Henry

customer_reviews.title: I really like the soft feel and the design
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I really like the soft feel and the design. The cost is good. Cons: The seam lost the ink and shows white. Okay, no biggy. It fits well when I first put it on, but when I start working out it slowly slides up/off. They don't come in different sizes, but not sure if a tighter fit or bigger fit would stop the slippage anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: small and rips easily
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a sm or medium size hat and bike helmet..this cap is tiny. Compression wear for your head is not ok lol
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: with continuous lasts two years
customer_reviews.text: I had two of these and after two years of using them alternately I had to replace them both as a piece ripped off as I was pulling it on over my ears. Same side both times. But the cap fits well and I guess for the price two years is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: June H

customer_reviews.title: Almost too small!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the swim caps color/design! However, I was concerned the it would be too small for my large head (I wear a 7 3/4 mens hat) and was almost right. After swimming my first 1/2 hour it starts riding up the sides of my head. Not a dealbreaker, just warning to others with large heads!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: speedo makes durable and great products. you know it's always good. nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: beeveejay

customer_reviews.title: Great cap but color not what was displayed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she was expecting the marbled purple color as indicated online and it was solid when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Puppymom

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product she says is very good quality of product. Doesn't gets her hair wet and easily to put on and take off .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa HDz.

customer_reviews.title: What in god’s name have I done.
customer_reviews.text: This is not an actual speedo bathing suit. Be careful out there guys.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Valcarcel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to see on the lake. Wish it covered my ears better but I have a long face so most swim caps don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Dawntae

customer_reviews.title: Not to keep hair dry while swimming
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep hair dry while swimming . Guess what? My hair was just as wet. Don’t buy if you want to keep hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K.

customer_reviews.title: A little tight...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking & works fine, but a little tight on my head.
customer_reviews.author: tamgib

customer_reviews.title: Good!!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't pull your hair! I was so afraid of that when I was looking to get one of these and it this one doesn't. These aren't the most attractive things to wear but I think this is definitely one of the better looking ones. I would recommend this if you want to keep your hair dry without ripping it out!
customer_reviews.author: anthony licari

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been swimming with this cap a few times a week for almost two months now. No issues with it, fits great, and doesn’t pull my (long) hair.
customer_reviews.author: BleuBird

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy covered my head wen swimming
customer_reviews.text: Surged its purpose. Sturdy covered my head wen swimming. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chin

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FIT
customer_reviews.text: I had to get this one for my 6 year old, the 'Jr' cap did not fit him. This one fits great, he loves it. Goes on easy over wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Conaty

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfort. Didn't slide at all during my 40-minute swim.
customer_reviews.author: Calamity Jane

customer_reviews.title: Forget Its On Your Head
customer_reviews.text: This bargain is so comfortable that I forget I am wearing it. It is really durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was my second one like this for my daughter. It works well to keep her hair dry during swim lessons. I pull it over her ears and it keeps water out of her ears as well.
customer_reviews.author: Totsiegirl3

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item for my 11 year old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my 11 year old daughter who is a competitive swimmer. She has long curly thick hair. This swim cap holds it all in.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Blaha

customer_reviews.title: The Best Swim Cap there is!
customer_reviews.text: My old one ripped after wearing it 5 times a week 2 hours a day in the sun for almost a year, so I had to get another one, I've never used a cap that's better at staying in place while still being so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: NOBD

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick for keeping hair dry & water out ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick for keeping hair dry & water out of ears; also use it underneath a dive hood for when diving in cold waters!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Claybourne

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this once and it was fine. The second time I went to wear it, it ripped before I could even get it on my head. (There was nothing to snag it on or anything, just ripped.)
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits good. Bought it for my teen daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Not very bright.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Standard neon cap. Too thin for my liking. Make it more solid colored.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Big enough.for your hair and and doesn't snag and pull hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits exactly as intended. The only issue with ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits exactly as intended. The only issue with the elastomeric silicone is that if you put conditioner in your hair before swimming to prevent split ends, it will slide off a bit. But this would be an issue with a lot of swim caps.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Lasted all season
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all swim and dive season at high school! Just starting summer season- fingers crossed - will last all summer too!
customer_reviews.author: Li law

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, thickness is great, comfort is good. Only thing is, it stains fast from chlorine if not maintained properly and washed and powdered every after use
customer_reviews.author: Lito J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. I'm so happy with this swim cap.
customer_reviews.text: This swim cap met my expectations it firs perfect it is not too tight but tight enough not to fall of my head. I recommend this product. I also love the material.
customer_reviews.author: Theadora Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who swims competitively has long hair. She says this is the most comfortable cap she has worn to date. Holds up well, has not faded. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L S

customer_reviews.title: I bought this cap with high hopes. The construction ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cap with high hopes. The construction seemed durable, until it tore on the 4th use. Yes, I did follow the instructions to the letter when putting it on my daughter's head. Now I have to purchase another swim cap.
customer_reviews.author: HonestlyReviewed90

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This cap is not worth buying. Very thin, the ruffles on the inside do help a bit in not having the cap slide off. However, the cap now has a tear after the second time of wearing it. I am a competitive masters swimmer who knows what caps can deal with. Some of my older speedo caps are 20 years old. Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja K.

customer_reviews.title: My head size 7 hat, Swim cap is super tight to the point of being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My head size 7 (hat size), Swim cap is super tight to the point of being uncomfortable. I do lap swimming
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. His old one tore after several years, when he went to a local retailer they told him they wont get any for a couple of months, this is where Amazon really excels. No matter the season, you find what you need. And this fit him great.
customer_reviews.author: LeeSFV

customer_reviews.title: Great Cap for  purely Recreational Swimmer
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything to compare this cap to, but it seems that I did well right out of the blocks. My head is a size 7 with shoulder length hair up in a ponytail. The cap is comfortable, fits well and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I left this is nits original package until I was ready to use. Unfortunately the second I stretched very slightly is broke. This item is brand new and never been worn. On its first stretch is becomes unusable?
customer_reviews.author: Calif

customer_reviews.title: Good Swim Cap
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable cap. Does not pull on your hair at all and did not seem to be overly tight. I would recommend this product to any recreational to competitive swimmer. Best swim cap I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and keeps sun off top of head, provides additional warmth
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the sun off my exposed head top. Fits well. Can be a bit fragile.
customer_reviews.author: rdc

customer_reviews.title: No more headaches, edges don't roll.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first silicone cap that doesn't squish my head or roll up (or pop off!). I finally switched from latex caps after 28 years as a swimmer. No more headaches after practice! I'm buying backups in case they stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Silicon Terrific - Flush the Lycra Caps
customer_reviews.text: I am a Master Swimmer and the silicon swim caps although are more expensive are worth. Easy to get on and off and they last not the cheap lycra for $3 to $5.
customer_reviews.author: JPR

customer_reviews.title: My hair still gets wet and the sides roll up ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair still gets wet and the sides roll up so it doesn't really fit an adult in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This new elastomeric fit is so easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Y. J.

customer_reviews.title: I missed the return window...don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. I'm very upset I somehow managed to miss the return window because it was a complete waste of money! It pulls your hair and does not fit nearly like described AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Not too tight compare with solid silicone cause my head is big.
customer_reviews.author: thewhitemoon

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. For swimming you can never go wrong with speedo!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Well, it leaks but does the job. I like that it's silicone.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the most part functional and comfortable, but sometimes slips off after a lot of laps.
customer_reviews.author: geislerjen

customer_reviews.title: Bummer because I love the color and thought the brand was the best
customer_reviews.text: Just because its Speedo it doesn't mean much anymore unfortunately. The cap barely fits my head and doesn't stay on. Bummer because I love the color and thought the brand was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McGarry

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 12 year old daughter. She used it twice, both times her hair was completely wet. It was tight on her head. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam  Doo

customer_reviews.title: Stand out in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is beginning to really enjoy swimming and lessons. She loves to wear her cap and stand out among the other swimmers.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits over long thick hair without pulling it.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My hair is very long & thick. This cap easily fits over my hair without pulling it.
customer_reviews.author: YoMama

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this and when she got out of pool her hair was wet. The cap didn’t do its job at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Champion

customer_reviews.title: Water doesn’t get into the cap
customer_reviews.text: Fits very nice on my small head & it looks very cute
customer_reviews.author: GiGi30

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it. Easy slip on cap ever with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jenie Vi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright cap! Speedo quality as expected! Good find for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NCamp

customer_reviews.title: Solid purple
customer_reviews.text: This cap looks patterned, but the cap we were sent was solid purple which was disappointing. We could not return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! I purchased this for my daughter for Christmas and it ripped it half in 3 weeks. She swims 4 times a week but her other swim caps have lasted over a year. Very disappointed, she was excited about the fun design.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Time

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to fit all of my hair in it , the back of my head sticks out a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Brand
customer_reviews.text: Speedo brand works the best no doubt- tried other brands even Nike. Speedo is the best for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Leepucci

customer_reviews.title: Wet hair
customer_reviews.text: Didn't keep hair dryer although looked like there was a good seal around it. Nice color and soft material. Very stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: J&NW

customer_reviews.title: Well fitted, Dry well, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I enrolled in a beginner's swimming class, and it's perfect for beginner swimmer like me. Good price, good quality
customer_reviews.author: Catchagrenade

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Cap stays in place even with short hair. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed Customer - This cap ripped on the first use ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Disappointed Customer - This cap ripped on the first use at the pool. Big Disappointment - ***** It never make it in the pool before it ripped in half!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the good fit, ease of putting it on, and the protection it gives my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Moen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight. Stays on in the water. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K.

customer_reviews.title: Attracts mold
customer_reviews.text: Does not hurt when taking on and off, which is a plus. However, it now has black moldy spots all over the inside and outside that will not come out.
customer_reviews.author: tara-dactyl

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cap - great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cap - great price and great quality. I swim 5-6 times a week and these basically last forever. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kellybrianne

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: It was a great purchase if you are thinking about being a competitive swimmer or just someone who takes it slow in the pool. It mostly keeps your hair dry but then again it's not exactly glued to your head so it will get a little damp. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Shianne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little too stretchy where it wants to slide off.
customer_reviews.author: R. MARI

customer_reviews.title: Great quality...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quality and not pulling hairs, easy to put it on and off, but it's not meant for long hairs...
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable cap
customer_reviews.text: The cap is very elastic and goes on over wet hair without pulling or tugging. I wear this under another large cap to protect my processed hair from the saline pool. I am 5'9 and weigh 150 pounds, with shoulder length, thick hair. There is no problem getting this on my head. If you want to keep water out of your hair, wear two caps. I don't know if this keeps hair dry. Getting the hair wet in tap water first protects the hair more as the shaft is already saturated with water.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Miller

customer_reviews.title: Swim cap for swim class
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 4 stars because the incorrect color was delivered. Still a swim cap for my daughter’s swimming class so it serves the purpose. This swim cap is a most have for little swimmers.
customer_reviews.author: Narda

customer_reviews.title: This worked great in the pool and was easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: This worked great in the pool and was easy to get on. I haven't tried any other cap, being new to swimming laps.
customer_reviews.author: MPD

customer_reviews.title: average cap, nothing fancy
customer_reviews.text: yes, keeps your hair dry but not on the edges. Easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: SID

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good except for sometimes it slightly goes off of head.
customer_reviews.author: Nithin K

customer_reviews.title: I ordered orange received green
customer_reviews.text: It's a good swim cap but for what I paid I wish I would have gotten the correct color.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Morris

customer_reviews.title: Speedo swim cap
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old used this for the whole swim season and loved it. Great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Z.

product_meta.title: Speedo Unisex-Adult Swim Cap Silicone Elastomeric
product_meta.description: For generations Speedo has been synonymous with comfort, quality, and the fastest racing suits on earth. From their humble beginnings in Australia to the global domination of the racing world we see today, Speedo has always put quality before all else. The Speedo Aqualab team has recently won awards for their patented Fastskin material modeled after the skin of a shark. Speedo has since expanded from exclusively crafting racing suits, to now providing beginner, junior, and lifeguard lines for all skill levels. The Speedo name can be found on a wide variety of suits for men, women and children. Speedo also offers a wide range of sportswear, footwear and accessories, some of which include goggles, fins, training tools, and water-shoes. Regardless of your needs, Speedo will help maximize your swim!
feature_bullets: Interior textured surface won't snag hair or feel too tight
Soft stretchy silicone provides optimum compression and comfort
